title: Wrong wrapping of contour points using dense deformation
body:
Hello, 
**Task**
I am trying to use VoxelMorph (VM) to register cardiac ultrasound images.

**What have you tried**
I trained a baseline VM model without diffeomorphic or probabilistic, and predict the displacement field between end-systolic (ES) frame and end-diastolic (ED) frame. 

**Details of experiments**
I get moved_image by wrapping the moving_image using the resulted dense displacement field. I also want to wrap the contour (annotation points). The Red curve is the contour of left ventricle (LV) of fixed_image, the blue curve is obtained by wrapping the red curve.  I was thinking: the wrapping of contour in the fixed_image would match the moving_image, but it seems not doing so. 
From ES to ED, comparing the moving and moved images, I can see the LV is obviously enlarged, however, the warped contour (blue curve) does not obviously shrinkedâ€¦ did I wrap the contour correctly?

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96538810/148211043-bb0aa209-8657-4b7c-8c55-835062162a49.png)

I use these code:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96538810/148211201-9169275e-933e-4cb4-b967-2f1baf99e6b0.png)

Thanks a lot for helping out!
